Flow.description: Only replaced the 'Salesforce_Order_Number__c' field with the 'Orderz__c' field. As a part of merging two same Order lookup fields on the Case Object.

fields.name: scn_CPECOE_Order_Complete_F1
fields.fieldText: Your team has now completed the flow and it is ready for you to approve the order. Please go to the bottom and approve that the order is complete using the approval history section

fields.name: scn_DCS_Order_Complete_F1
fields.fieldText: Your team has now completed the flow and it is ready for you to approve the order. Please go to the bottom and approve that the order is complete using the approval history section

fields.name: scn_DCS_Order_Complete_F1_0
fields.fieldText: Your team has now assigned the order and it is ready for you to approve the order to be worked. Please go to the bottom and approve that the order is Assigned using the approval history section

fields.name: scn_HotCut_Order_Complete_F1
fields.fieldText: Your team has now completed the flow and it is ready for you to approve the order. Please go to the bottom and approve that the order is complete using the approval history section
